name: Samurai black & white
description:
This game was created in 2 days, with the theme being contrast.  It is a black and white platformer made in 3D. The two colours are the contrast as well as being  the main game dynamic. When you are  on the white colour you receive a speed buff and a wall climb ability, but you will die in 1 hit from the enemies. The white colour gives you 4 times more health and a projectile, but you are slower. 

There are also some enemies if you manage to get further into the level.

Credits:

TajTheGuy (Taj Lokovšek)- Modeller and animator Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/tajtheguy

Normal (Juš Dolžan) - Programmer 

Adonis (Denis Selčan) - Level designer and programmer
